articles.author: Ellise Shafer
articles.title: ‘Wicked’: Man Who Grabbed Ariana Grande on Singapore Red Carpet Charged in Court - Variety
articles.description: A man who grabbed Ariana Grande at the Asian premiere of "Wicked: For Good" in Singapore on Thursday night has been charged in court.
articles.content:
A man who grabbed Ariana Grande at the Asian premiere of “Wicked: For Good” in Singapore on Thursday night has been charged in court.
